title: LUFFY DESTROYS HORDY LOL | One Piece Episode 566 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Couples Reaction Channel
description: A couples reaction and discussion video for One Piece Episode 566, featuring reactions to Luffy's decisive victory over Hody Jones.

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 554 – 574) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive written review of the final portion of the Fish-Man Island Arc, including analysis of episode 566 and the climactic battles against the New Fish-Man Pirates.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the end of the Fish-Man Island Arc

title: One Piece: Hody Jones is the Most Boring Fight
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An editorial analysis discussing why the Luffy versus Hody Jones fight is considered one of the most boring in the series, examining the lack of tension and unbalanced power levels.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the Fish-Man Island Arc battles

title: One Piece: Why Is The Fish-Man Island Arc So Hated
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An analysis of why the Fish-Man Island Arc receives criticism from fans, discussing pacing issues, weak antagonists, and the Straw Hats being overpowered.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the entire Fish-Man Island Arc

title: 565-566: Luffy's All-out Attack! Red Hawk Blasts! and Coming to an End! the Final Decisive Battle Against Hordy!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed episode recap and analysis of episodes 565-566, covering Luffy's Red Hawk technique and the final battles against the New Fish-Man Pirates officers.

title: One Piece: The 10 Strongest Villains Of The Fish-Man Island Arc, Ranked
author: CBR Editorial
description: A ranking and analysis of the New Fish-Man Pirates officers and other antagonists from the Fish-Man Island Arc, including Hody Jones, Hyouzou, and others defeated in episode 566.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses all Fish-Man Island Arc villains
